name: omm-bundle

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
Omm-bundle is a library implementing the orbital minimization method for
solving the Kohn-Sham equation as a generalized eigenvalue problem and a
bundle of four separate libraries: pspBLAS, MatrixSwitch, libOMM,
tomato.

dependencies.name: blas
dependencies.description: IBM's Engineering and Scientific Subroutine Library (ESSL).

dependencies.name: dbcsr
dependencies.description: Distributed Block Compressed Sparse Row matrix library.

dependencies.name: gmake
dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.

dependencies.name: lapack
dependencies.description: IBM's Engineering and Scientific Subroutine Library (ESSL).

dependencies.name: mpi
dependencies.description: Cray/HPE packaging of MVAPICH2 for HPE Apollo systems

dependencies.name: scalapack
dependencies.description:
Intel oneAPI Math Kernel Library (Intel oneMKL; formerly Intel Math
Kernel Library or Intel MKL), is a library of optimized math routines
for science, engineering, and financial applications. Core math
functions include BLAS, LAPACK, ScaLAPACK, sparse solvers, fast Fourier
transforms, and vector math. LICENSE INFORMATION: By downloading and
using this software, you agree to the terms and conditions of the
software license agreements at https://intel.ly/393CijO.
